text: Futhi kwathi lapho esefika emanzini aseMadyan wafica isixuku sabantu siphuzisa (imfuyo) amanzi futhi ngaphandle kwaso (isixuku sabantu) wafica abesifazane ababili ababemise (imihlambiyaboukubaingaphuziuMose) wathi,“kwenzenjani ngani nobabili” bobabili bathi, “angeke siyiphuzise (imihlambi yethu amanzi) kuze kube abelusi basusa (imihlambi yabo) futhi ubaba wethu usekhule kakhulu”
